website_summaries.verdict: These high-quality, tasty bars are your best pick if you want good protein, low sugar, and a unique crispy texture that is different from the others.
pros: With exceptional protein, no hydrogenated oils, and lots of fiber, these all-natural protein bars are at the top of our list
Contains no gluten and low sodium, but has lots of flavor
cons: Not dairy-free or soy-free, though they offer every other benefit of quality protein bars

customer_reviews.title: WARNING Contains sucrulose!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had I realized these contained sucrulose also known as Splenda, I never would of bought these! Sucrulose/Splenda is known to cause cancer & brain tumors just like aspartame dose! They both cause very serious health problems that can lead to death! Do a search & look up the dangers of ingesting both Sucrulose & Aspartame!!! You'll be horrified at what you'll learn about these dangerous chemicals! The sucrulose is processed with chlorine & when sucrulose enters the body it slowly turns into formaldehyde which is imbalming fluid that they put into dead bodies at funeral homes !!! Why companies still use sucrulose & aspartame in foods is horrible!!! Please do the research for yourselves!!! Your life depends upon it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: False Adverstisement
customer_reviews.text: The manufacturer or seller of this product only advertises 2g sugar, 20g of "whey" proteins. When you read the actual package, there is also 6g of sugar alcohol (which is a carbohydrate) and soy protein isolate, rice syrup (which essentially is a sugar), Maltitol Syrup which is a carbohydrate and can raise glycemic index, and artificial flavors. These bars are not high quality and it's insulting to consumers when manufacturers "hide" ingredients or do not advertise them properly to the consumer. Either make a healthy Protein bar or don't. Do not try to fool us. Advertise for what it truly is and the consumer can make better choices
customer_reviews.author: Taylors

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein bar of all time.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried lots of protein bars. Quest bars I've found to be very popular, and compared to other bars, quite good. These however, are way better tasting than those. These actually taste good and not synthetic and fake. The only downside is that it does contain SOME soy protein. These really do taste good. I often see people reviewing horrible tasting products as tasting like candy. These taste like rice crispy bars.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Murdock

customer_reviews.title: CHEATED ME! Bars are half eaten or cut!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been ordering these protein bars for a while now and I usually have no complaints but for some reason my recent order was full of bars with a lot of empty space in the pack and only half as long as the others. What’s even weirder is that the edges are not smooth as if someone took a bite out of the bar. I initially thought this was the case for just one bar but I went on to find this issue with several others. I feel cheated! I have included a video and picture.
customer_reviews.author: N. Opara-Sea

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein bar I have had in a while
customer_reviews.text: I eat a lot of different protein bars and I have to say this is the best tasting one I have had in a while that is in the 200-250 calorie range with at least 20g of protein. I typically rotate from Quest, Cliff Builder, One, Premier Protein, and any other ones I stumble across. It honestly tasted like a Rice Krispies treat with some Reese's peanut butter on it. I also liked that it was bigger than a lot of other similar bars. It is a crisp product so means it will be bigger due to air, but the larger size can make you think you are eating a bit more than you actually are.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Trent

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I'm not one who typically writes reviews; good or bad. However, the taste of the salted toffee pretzel protein bar compelled me to make an exception. These taste absolutely incredible. If these flavors are in your wheelhouse at all, you won't be disappointed. Also purchased the vanilla marshmallow and PB crunch and, while they taste good as well, they don't stack up to salted toffee. It's just such an original flavor. The others can be found anywhere, and taste like many other protein bars I've tried. Anyway, back to salted toffee. I'd rather eat it than most candy bars. No joke, it's that tasty. The bars are great between meal snacks. Will be purchasing more soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok, I guess. If you dont mind being gassy
customer_reviews.text: All these glowing reviews led me to buy a whole box of these. Take it from me, if you buy a whole box you may not eat them all for a very long time. After I had one, I wasn't looking forward to another one any time soon. They are certainly not what I would call delicious... and they WILL give you gas. Yup. So, there's THAT.
customer_reviews.author: ThatPainterChick

customer_reviews.title: Good taste, just protein and nothing else (which may or may not be what YOU need)
customer_reviews.text: Good taste, not hard to eat. Like a rice krispy bar. Not super sweet. Would suggest having with a glass of water or milk as it is a tad dry. The chocolate ones are good too. Beware that while there is very little sugar in these, there is sugar alcohols, which can make you gassy if you consume a lot. Only downside to these bars is they contain no vitamins or fiber. But then again, if you just need a protein boost, this is a solid option as there isn't anything else to them.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Tasty protein bar
customer_reviews.text: These are probably my favorite protein bars. I have always hated the quest bar texture, and these and honestly like a rice crispy. My flavor ratings are below. Mint chocolate chip 10/10 Peanut butter crunch 10/10 Vanilla marshmallow 10/10 Salted toffee pretzel 9/10 Strawberry crunch 8/10 Chocolate caramel crunch 8/10 Mocha 6/10 I have to make note that the mocha has pieces of roasted coffee beans in it that I found very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa

customer_reviews.title: If you like dry and hard, try this bar
customer_reviews.text: I can’t figure out how these protein bars have so many 5 star reviews. The flavor is good, but their dryness ruins it. I tried dipping one in milk, but that didn’t help. I have three teenage boys who will eat pretty much anything, and between them and their friends, our pantry doesn’t stay stocked for long. The box with these bars is still sitting half-full on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G

customer_reviews.title: ONE OF THE BEST PROTEIN BARS I'VE EVER HAD
customer_reviews.text: I've been substituting protein bars for a "traditional" breakfast or lunch for many years. They really help control my weight while enjoying a candy bar-like treat. I don't kid myself about some of the less-than-ideal ingredients that help produce the wonderful flavors and consistency I crave, but everything in life is a trade-off, and these are better than a bowl of any kind of cereal if one is concerned about weight gain. Heck, I'm 81 years old and no longer worried about artificial sweeteners. If you're a die-hard "health food nut," you won't be happy when you read he ingredients of most of these protein bars.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie brooklyn girl

customer_reviews.title: Not dusty or slimy or heavy or gooey.
customer_reviews.text: I eat a protein bar every day. It's an easy breakfast, and it does a better job than most breakfast foods carrying me through to lunch. I've tried many different brands, and I have to say that these are by FAR my favorite. A lot of protein bars are super-heavy and sit in your gut like a lump, or they're sort of a gooey/slimy mess. I've even had some that somehow managed to taste like dust. These are light, crunchy, and taste genuinely good. Can't recommend them enough.
customer_reviews.author: Carpe Tao

customer_reviews.title: these are my favorite bars
customer_reviews.text: I love the salted toffee BSN protein bars. I've tried three different kinds, and I'm a fan of their products. Salted toffee is my favorite. I keep these in my bag, at my office, and will often grab them when heading out - I've brought two if I'm meeting someone, so we'll both have a decent snack option if missing a meal. Great taste and 20mg of protein and low sugar. Only thing I don't love about them is there's artificial sweetner, but they legit taste like a candy bar and I'm sure that's how they make it possible.
customer_reviews.author: erikalin

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste
customer_reviews.text: I usually spend a lot of time reading the ingredients and nutrition information. The product must be Gluten Free, low fat and low sugar. The gluten and sugar information was readily available on the top or side of the box. After reading a few reviews, I ordered my first box of vanilla marshmallow. I have to eat early in the morning and these are great with a cup of coffee. I plan to order two of the other flavors today.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic protein bars - RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: I love these protein bars. I got a subscription order set up so I get a box every 2 weeks. Allows me to eat one per day and I keep them in my office at work. Helps me get in a few extra calories and some extra protein that I wouldn't otherwise get. Flavor - Incredible. May be a little dry for some people but I think the taste is awesome. Size - They are good size and volume so they do fill you up a little bit especially if you're just hungry for a snack. Ingredients - I'm not a nutritionist but I like that there are some carbs in it along with a good amount if protein.
customer_reviews.author: Jess Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Does not sit like a brick!
customer_reviews.text: The main reason why I like these bars is that they do not sit like a brick in my stomach. I have tried multiple protein bars and have now settled on these as they are incredibly light (not dense), surprisingly tasty, and easy to digest. Honestly, I am surprised how much protein these pack compared to other bars based on the positives listed above. All in all they are bit expensive, but not feeling like blowing chunks after every serving is well worth the added cost.
customer_reviews.author: SsgtMike

customer_reviews.title: Good enough to get by
customer_reviews.text: I might be a bit of a snob when it comes to protein bars or health food in general. That said, I felt like these had a good taste but were VERY dry. I had to drink water after what felt like every bite in order to avoid the dry-mouth feeling. The are of a good size and so are more filling than some other bars out there, just be sure to have water on hand. Would buy again (with a case of water)
customer_reviews.author: RyRob

customer_reviews.title: Would rather eat a real Rice Krispie and have a protein shake
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is not terrible, but when I eat them I always think, "this is kind of good and it also kind of tastes like vanilla chapstick." For the same macros you could eat a small Rice Krispie treat and have a protein shake or another lean protein. I have found myself avoiding eating them, so I would say they're not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kaila White

customer_reviews.title: Product itself is great, but my box was missing 4 bars!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying different flavors of the protein crisp bar, because I really enjoy the texture and flavors. It's nice to mix it up from the typical soft, chewy protein bars! However, I recently bought the mint chocolate chip flavor, and while I really loved the bar itself, the box only came with 8 bars instead of 12! This is not a common issue, thankfully. This is the 3rd flavor I've bought, and the other two arrived as expected, so it was probably just a mistake during packaging. But I was really disappointed when I discovered 1/3 of my bars were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Tan

customer_reviews.title: These are phenomenal!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these! I’m on a strict diet and these fit right into my macros. They are just like rice crispy treats. So good. I’ve tried about three flavors and they’re all so yummy
customer_reviews.author: Caroline D

customer_reviews.title: Sent the wrong flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I’m usually chill. But this really upset me because they sent the wrong flavor, i was going on a trip and couldn’t return it. In general i don’t do returns. The vanilla flavor tastes like protein powder super chalky and wayyyy too sweet. You would think it wouldn’t be THAT sweet but it’s by far sweeter than all the other flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Good taste.
customer_reviews.text: I like these, and I don’t like many protein bars, so that is saying something. It doesn’t have the chalky sandy taste and texture as a lot of them do. Also these are peanut free and that is important to us because we have a kid who is allergic so try to keep a peanut free house.
customer_reviews.author: E. H.

customer_reviews.title: Finally a Protein bar You Will Enjoy Eating!
customer_reviews.text: I don't eat meat so I eat a lot of protein bars and these are exceptional! light, crispy and large enough to be filling yet the protein to calorie ratio is excellent. Best yet - they are delicious! The Smores bars are my personal favorites and I think that the pricing here at Amazon is very reasonable. I have tried some other flavors and they are also delicious!
customer_reviews.author: carol notine

customer_reviews.title: Bars contain Splenda!
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample pretzel bar and ordered a box immediately because they are high protein, low sugar and taste great! But I'm highly disappointed that they contain Splenda! I'm firmly against all sugar-substitutes except Xylitol! There is absolutely no reason to use carcinogenic chemicals as a substitute for sugar when Xylitol is available!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Mc

customer_reviews.title: Rice Krispy Treat Protein Bars
customer_reviews.text: These things remind me of a Rice Krispy Treat as a protein bar. I really enjoy the flavors and I find the S'mores and Salted Toffee flavors to be my favorites, but also have yet to find a flavor I do not like. The profile is overall comparable to other protein bars on the market. The cost is overall fairly comparable to other protein bars on the market. These simply taste better to me and are a go to snack with some density to the bar that makes me only need 1 (or 2 on occasion).
customer_reviews.author: LiftingDad

customer_reviews.title: Amazing! Legit rice crispy treat experience :-)
customer_reviews.text: Just tried one for the first time and LOVED it! Tasty light, crunchy but also chewy, sweet (not overly), and buttery just like a real rice crispy treats. This would make an awesome healthy, guilt-free dessert. So glad I bought a pack. Price could be a little more reasonable, but that's the whole protein supplement market for you...and don't expect to be full from one. I'd suggest them to simply curb any sweet cravings after a healthy meal. Great job BSN!
customer_reviews.author: Sly Like a Fox Howls Like a Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Peanut Butter Crunch bar is a winner!!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a wonderful surprise. I have purchased protein bars to try, that I have thrown out because they tasted so nasty. This is super crisp and tastes great. Will go wonderfully with coffee on the way to work as a protein filled breakfast that has a nice crunch and subtle sweetness. Love it!! Will buy this again. Going to try the Chocolate Crunch one next!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Too tasty and addictive.
customer_reviews.text: I need to stop buying these bars, since they are so tasty that ruin my diet :) But seriously - this is a high-quality product, better than any other protein bars I tried before.
customer_reviews.author: MF

customer_reviews.title: not very good
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps it is just my taste buds but this bar tastes like fake maple or something equally unpleasant, it also has an odd texture when chewing, kind of chalky. Read many reviews before buying and will never believe any of them again, was hoping the price indicated a better product, NOPE, rank this as one of the worst protein bars I have ever tried to eat. Will just drink my protein supplements from now on. Luckily, I volunteer with others who will eat ANYTHING so they won't go to waste.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smalley

customer_reviews.title: They melt before getting delivered.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars but i only gave 4 starts because i think they need to make this delivered better. They melt being in their van all day and to get them by 6pm they are melted and only way to get them better is to put them in the freezer right away. They need to figure out how to make bars a priority or keep it in a cooler.
customer_reviews.author: #1Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Dry
customer_reviews.text: I eat a lot of protein bars and I am familiar with the taste of protein powder. I threw these away because the taste/ amount of the powder is overwhelming and the inside is very dry.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine M.

customer_reviews.title: Vanilla Marshmallow Tastes Like Soap - Stick With Peanut Butter Crunch.
customer_reviews.text: Love the BSN Peanut Butter Crunch - I tried venturing out with a new flavor, Vanilla Marshmallow... immediately regretted it. The vanilla has a weird after taste that reminds me of soap. I'm TRYING to finish the box so I don't waste it, but it's hard to stomach. I can't get over the after taste.... just stick with Peanut Butter Crunch.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M

customer_reviews.title: does not taste good, and hard to break the bar in half...
customer_reviews.text: This flavor is really unsatisfactory, does not taste good and I don't recommend buying it. Additionally the bar is hard to break into pieces because the frost layer on the top is stuck together, and tastes overly sugary and unhealthy. This is for the apple-pie flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Med

customer_reviews.title: Good protein bar, overly sweet flavor
customer_reviews.text: A huge fan of these bars after having the peanut butter and cookies and cream! However was pretty disappointed with this flavor. It was overly sweet in a fake sort I’d way. If you’re considering these I would recommend a different flavor. Will stick to the other flavors in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Denniston

customer_reviews.title: Best protein bar flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is amazing. Best protein type bar I’ve ever had. Doesn’t make me feel nauseous! Maybe not the best ingredients but compare to trash you might be eating, this is a great alternative to fill that craving. I’ve ordered these many many times.
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Breakfast every day
customer_reviews.text: I’m not hardcore on macro counts. But I have one every day for breakfast. I still like some other brands but the rice crispy texture is way lighter than some dense bars out there. Peanut butter is by far my favorite over the salted caramel and s’mores I’ve tried.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Each bar tastes like cheating.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite, and I like several others. I get my protein and very little sugar. They are now a major part of my weight loss program. Three a day and veggies + meat for main meal. I'm down 9 lbs in a month. Feels like not dieting.
customer_reviews.author: William Vedder

customer_reviews.title: Nice Crispy Protein Bar
customer_reviews.text: I was getting kind of bored of the dough-like, soft protein bars. These are a nice texture change. More like a rice bar with a little bit of chocolate mixed in. These are extremely tasty and it's awesome that they're so low sugar.
customer_reviews.author: JJTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Missing 5 of the 12 bars
customer_reviews.text: I've been a loyal fan of BSN for quite some time and love all their products. This is the fourth box of protein bars I ordered and this was the first time I didn't receive all 12 promised in the sealed box (this box's perforated seal was broken and only had 7 bars in it)
customer_reviews.author: John Miericke

customer_reviews.title: Tasty, when they send you the right flavor. Best protein bar I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Love the s'mores flavor, though this time Amazon sent me the wrong flavor. Don't worry about the other reviews that exclaim false advertisement or something. BSN is obviously advertising 'net carbs' and it's very common to do so. These are very good quality bars and taste amazing. They're plenty healthy too, don't let the fake fitness people on here tell you otherwise; they're likely all weak and need more protein!
customer_reviews.author: Brian D

customer_reviews.title: Great but not as tasty as the Marshmallow or S'Mores
customer_reviews.text: I love these protein bars because they taste good and they are not as heavy and dense as most on the market. I only took off a star because the flavor wasn't as good as the Marshmallow or S'mores. All in all so far of the 3 my favorite is Marshmallow.
customer_reviews.author: Domino N.

customer_reviews.title: Peanut Butter is the only way to go
customer_reviews.text: These are like candy. My fiancé and myself love the peanut butter bars. Typically we run out of these in a short period. Great for craving for appetite control as long as you can keep yourself from eating the whole box.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Too Sweet
customer_reviews.text: Good price on these but I found them too sweet which in turn made me thirsty. I think a lot of protein bars are like that so I'm not singling this one out. If sweet is OK with you then this product will suffice.
customer_reviews.author: RMW

customer_reviews.title: Great bar
customer_reviews.text: This is my “go to bar.” I really like all the flavors and the fact there’s no after taste. Glad I found these at Amazon. During the pandemic GNC was closed, but I was glad to see Amazon carried them and I got them quick with Prime
customer_reviews.author: Machete

customer_reviews.title: Rice Krispies protein bars!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best protein bars I have ever tasted. The vanilla marshmallow flavor tastes similar to a Rice Krispies treat, just less sweet and less chewy. The macros are fine.. 1g sugar, 20g protein. The bars are a little high in carbs, but I can deal with that. Carb conscious consumers will want to take this into consideration. Also, there is no fiber in these protein bars.
customer_reviews.author: Mo G

customer_reviews.title: sucralose
customer_reviews.text: Horrid taste, my world. I had hoped that the sucralose wouldn't be overwhelming. Nope. The bar's texture is great, and I'm left to wonder if this might have been THE BAR (drum role) if they had gone with the 4 gm sugar and left it at that.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Peanut Butter is Best
customer_reviews.text: The peanut butter flavored one is out of this world. I’d rather eat this than a cookie. It’s akin to a peanut butter rice crispy treat. The chocolate and mocha flavors on the other hand are a different story. Tastes like sugar alcohol and protein. Not good.
customer_reviews.author: Napasue

customer_reviews.title: Protein Bars
customer_reviews.text: Hello I have been eating these syntha 6 chocolate chip mint bars for a couple months now. They are truly delicious if you like mint ice cream. I notice a gain in strength and energy through my day. Very reasonible amount of protein per bar. I am going to continue buying these protein bars as I have YET to buy one that matched the quality, taste and results for an equal price!
customer_reviews.author: alex Jones

customer_reviews.title: One of BSN's Best Flavors
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor - not too much artificial flavor like some of the other Syntha Crisps.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Hauschild

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRED ITEM! BUYER BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Expired item received! Do Not delete this review, this is a legitimate complaint. They are sending expired bad tasting bars! The bars I bought before were good, the last order was bad product!
customer_reviews.author: margarito

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: They look nice but I honestly did not love the taste. Maybe I need to try a different flavor, consistency of the bar was fine!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not a good taste
customer_reviews.text: Nobody in my family cared for the taste of these. They may be a good source of protein if you can get past the sicky-sweet cardboard texture in your mouth. I should’ve tried one before I bought an entire box Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L. R.

customer_reviews.title: SO DELICIOUS
customer_reviews.text: I love these protein bars. They are so good it is hard to believe they have only 2 grams of sugar. I will continue to reorder. Hope Amazon will carry Mint Chocolate Bars and Salted Toffee Pretzel Bars again. Tried to reorder those two but was not able to.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle W. Orange

customer_reviews.title: Nasty flavor, skip!!
customer_reviews.text: I threw the box (Mocha flavor) out after I tried stomaching a few bars. Awful taste and I have a bland palate and tolerate a lot. But these were so gross. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: TeeM

customer_reviews.title: They eat like a rice crispy treat and taste delicious
customer_reviews.text: I order these every month and they never get old. They eat like a rice crispy treat and taste delicious. My biggest knock would be that they tried their best to ruin this bar by immediately following a whey and milk protein blend with soy protein isolate. I wish protein bar companies would leave the soy out!!
customer_reviews.author: YetiOrNottt

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flavor
customer_reviews.text: This tastes great! Packs enough protein and decent Cals. I eat it as needed. Before gym or after gym. Quick snack to get my energy up while I get food. Also used when to make up my protein and cals intake for the day when neeeded.
customer_reviews.author: T K

customer_reviews.title: Low sugar, tastes good
customer_reviews.text: I like the toffee flavor and crunch of these bars. Its 20gm of protein is higher than some, and there's only 4 grams of sugar. They still have 25gm carbs though. I'm diabetic and use them as a meal replacement without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: KrisZ.

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most delicious protein bars I’ve ever had. Or the most delicious bars just in general. I’m a huge mint chocolate fan so I was a little hesitant but these taste SOOOOO GOOD. I have re purchased by 2nd box already and am about to order my third. I just wish I could find these in a Store near me. I’m a super picky eater and very particular on textures and these are just 10/10 perfection. I couldn’t ask for a better bar
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Ward

customer_reviews.title: My favorite protein bar
customer_reviews.text: By far, these are the best quality proteins bars in terms of flavor, texture and nutrition. I buy them often. Protein bars seems to be hard chewy bricks or have a horrible aftertaste. Not these. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Ignatz

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: They taste great and don't have an aftertaste. I'd prefer a lower cost, but at least they don't taste like cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: For snacking,  not meal replacement
customer_reviews.text: These arrived quickly. They are not filling, and the taste was blah. I was looking for meal replacement protein bars. These are not.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Love peanut butter
customer_reviews.text: Reminds me of a rice crispy treat but with peanut butter and no marshmallow and less guilt. I love peanut butter so I enjoyed this protein bar. I will order again. I like them!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Carrara

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tasting bar
customer_reviews.text: Great tasting bar, great texture, no painful aftertaste of artificial sweeteners. Even forgetting it's a protein bar I'd still reach for this over other non junk food snacks. Much better than the competition. While cheaper than competition, still protein bars in general are a little overpriced I believe
customer_reviews.author: Ceyer

customer_reviews.title: Wrong flavor was sent
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to get the vanilla marshmallow! And I ended up getting the toffee pretzel instead 😕. I double checked and I definitely didn’t order that flavor so I’m not sure what happened.
customer_reviews.author: Adeline hall

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it, best ever. If you love peanut butter it is amazing. Low on sugar good on protein. I do look to add more proteins to your meal and taste good go for this.
customer_reviews.author: billy

customer_reviews.title: Avoid the mocha flavor!!! 🤢
customer_reviews.text: This product is fine, does what it's supposed to do, and there are other flavors that are actually good (chocolate crisp), but this one (mocha) is the single most disgusting thing I've ever put in my mouth. My taste buds and gag reflex may never recover. If you like this flavor, good for you, because it's a little cheaper than the others... but now I have 11.5 bars I can't eat. Blech.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hide these from your kids! They taste so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far these are the best tasting protein bars i have ever tasted. To me they taste like a rice crispies marshmallow treats. Not chalky and hard to swallow like most other bars ive had
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: These are SO good and very filling
customer_reviews.text: My work started carrying these under a different product name, but they are SO good. They have decent protein and low sugar, but I mostly keep these in the house because they're such a filling breakfast.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Actually Taste Good and are Filling
customer_reviews.text: These things actually fill you up. It helps me get through the day when i'm working out and watching calories. The protein amount is solid, and they taste great. I just wish they were a little cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Package Opened, Bar missing
customer_reviews.text: Package came opened and there was a bar missing. 11/ 12 bars inside.... great product but there is some issue with delivery
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got sent an EXPIRED BOX! DISAPPOINTED!!!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought a box of these on the 21st of April and when I got them the expiration date on the bars were the 3/4/20!!!! I am so DISAPPOINTED because BSN was a brand that I trusted. I was so exited to try these and now I can’t because it’s expired .dont waste your money on these. Smh
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just Okay with indistinguishable flavor
customer_reviews.text: Meh. Thought I would love this but it’s just okay. Doesn’t taste like a rice crispy to me. Or like anything else I can describe. Not bad tasting just not great.
customer_reviews.author: Nat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome texture & unique taste!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like caramel or toffee but these bars are really good! Texture is like Rice Krispie treats with icing on the bottom. Ratio of carbs-fat-protein is perfect for a snack or meal replacement, depending on your goals. Highly recommend these bars!
customer_reviews.author: Beloved One

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously good! More like a sweet snack you crave than ...
customer_reviews.text: Ridiculously good! More like a sweet snack you crave than a protein bar, but they didn't make me feel full. I have a hard time justifying paying that much for something that just feels like a light snack. I wanted something that was more of a meal replacement or at least make me feel full when I'm done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good healthy breakfast or snack food
customer_reviews.text: I got these for a family member who drives a truck and needs healthier snacks with him for the day. I am told these are tasty. They are also low sugar, high protein.
customer_reviews.author: Tesla

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: Terrible taste. Like eating protein powder that’s been caked onto a nasty rice crispie. But I’m pretty sure that’s all protein bars at this point
customer_reviews.author: Ian Hallett

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't taste like protein as in other brands. I've been refilling this and eat it daily before I hit the gym. Provide enough energy for my workout section and a great source of protein. Very delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Tung

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting protein bar
customer_reviews.text: My favorites protein bar. Tried lots of them. Obviously this is subject to your individual taste. I like the texture: Crunchy. I like the salt and savory nature. 20 gm protein not bad for a protein bar. Price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Rudich

customer_reviews.title: Great protein supplement.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Tastes like a protein bar. Vanilla-ish. Has that protein powder after-taste however but not unpleasent. I'd buy again and I have!
customer_reviews.author: H. Corley

customer_reviews.title: Best tasting protein bars on the market
customer_reviews.text: Son loves the mocha flavor and the texture is a nice break from the norm!
customer_reviews.author: Sar

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a few bars this one is by far the best tasting bar . dosen't have that chalky flavor most protine bars have
customer_reviews.author: Jose Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product multiple times. The bars are cheaper than what I would normally Pay. Overall I’m very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jason geyer

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are DELICIOUS!!! They taste even better than Rice Crispy Treats. I got a sample, and now I'm hooked. Everyone should give these a try! I wasn't a fan of the pretzel/toffee ones or the chocolate, but these were amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to chew and taste like a treat.
customer_reviews.text: I think they taste very good and will probably order again. The texture is chewy and crispy and they pack 20 g's of protein into what tastes like a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie C

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Peanut butter crunch is a winner! Who am I kidding? I’ve never had a flavor of these delicious little bars that is even just marginal. They’re my favorite protein bars.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer E

customer_reviews.title: Amazing protein crisp bat.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Delicious, low in sugar and has excellent mix of ingredients. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nordk Ltd.

customer_reviews.title: The chocolate mint flavored bars are very good
customer_reviews.text: I am very surprised. I am not a big chocolate mint fan, but these chocolate mint flavored protein bars are some of the best protein bars I have tasted. Also, they really satisfy your hunger and fill you up.
customer_reviews.author: George H.

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY love these. Great taste and flavor. As long as they keep the same ingredients and don't mess with the macros of the bar I will keep buying for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Clifton hayes

customer_reviews.title: Great to eat before a workout.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars and I eat one everyday before I go workout. High in protein and low in carbs and not loaded with sugar. The Smores flavor is great!
customer_reviews.author: TL Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste and good price
customer_reviews.text: These taste very good. The price is reasonable. I first tried this when I was sent a small sample from Amazon. Wound up buying a box
customer_reviews.author: D. G. Billingsley

customer_reviews.title: Stale and Hard
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and I am a repeat buyer and have tried almost every flavor. But the last time I ordered a Smore's flavored protein bar pack - it was very stale and hard which was different from what I was used to when I previously had the other bars. I am disappointed this was the case and makes me a little reluctant to continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: good texture
customer_reviews.text: good texture, a large variety of flavor. My favorite is MOCHA doesn't contain too much sugar, great for a quick lunch
customer_reviews.author: ATC

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite. Doesn’t have a bad protein flavor. Taste like a candy bar!! Love these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirstin

customer_reviews.title: Not delicious at all!
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why this product's review is over 4 stars, honestly, for me this protein bar has been the worst protein bar in terms of taste.
customer_reviews.author: David Cho

customer_reviews.title: Reach For  It
customer_reviews.text: Whey good. For a protein bar this is crispy chocolate generous 20 grams of protein. Travels easy in backpack, handbag or hoodie pocket.
customer_reviews.author: FootFairy

customer_reviews.title: Energy for workouts
customer_reviews.text: I buy Protein Crisp bars for my 17 year old grandson to eat at school because he doesn’t like their cafeteria food plus he needs the extra energy for when he lift weights after classes. He gets moody when he’s low on energy so I rather spend extra cash so he’ll be his usual self, funny.
customer_reviews.author: JOSUE RODRIGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: A WIN
customer_reviews.text: fantastic will not disappoint great flavor(this is a snack here) I love it but then again I love rice crispy treats. it holds you over as a quick meal and taste great in the process
customer_reviews.author: Ben B

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: It literally tastes like mint ice cream. I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Carraway

customer_reviews.title: Re-Order Frequently
customer_reviews.text: I re-order these bars. They taste like a rice krispie treat, yet they are protein bars. It's a no brainer to try this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding worth
customer_reviews.text: Almost back to the bod I had 6 yrs ago because I had extra supplimentation for food value needs
customer_reviews.author: Fukinewguy

product_meta.title: BSN Protein Bars - Protein Crisp Bar by Syntha-6, Whey Protein, 20g of Protein, Gluten Free, Low Sugar, Salted Toffee Pretzel, 12 Count
product_meta.description: Flavor:Salted Toffee PreztleBusting your butt in the weight room doesn't have to mean punishing your taste buds during recovery. Reward yourself with BSN's Syntha-6 Protein Crisp Bar, a serious combination of incredible taste and unique texture without compromising your macros. At just 230 calories, each Syntha-6 Protein Crisp Bar is loaded with 20g of premium proteins and only 2g of sugar. And with a light and crispy texture filled with the decadent flavor of Syntha-6 in each crunch, every day will taste like cheat day. Tear into multiple delicious flavors for an ultra-convenient, protein-packed snack between meals, after your workout or whenever you crave a guilt-free bite on the go. You've earned it.
feature_bullets: GLUTEN FREE, 230-240 CALORIES PER BAR – help fuel your body with this macro-friendly protein bar
PREMIUM PROTEIN BLEND –20g blend of protein-packed whey protein isolate, whey protein concentrate, and milk protein concentrate
4G SUGAR OR LESS – satisfy your sweet-tooth while taking in 2-4g of sugar
UNIQUE CRUNCHY TEXTURE – sink your teeth into a light, yet satisfying crispy textured protein bar
EASY SNACK OPTION – convenient enough to travel anywhere you go to support your health and fitness goals while on the go

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
